name: Surf Monster
description:
Surf's up, surf monsters!

You're the raddest Dracula in town, and you like nothing better than catching a wave! But dang, bro! All those other loser Draculas are totally bogus and just wanna spoil it for you so watch out as they fly toward you! Carve a gnarly wave but be careful not to go too crazy or you'll totally wipe out!
